ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The results shown here are in part based upon data generated by the TCGA Research Network ( http://cancergenome.nih.gov/ accessed on 19 December 2020). The GEPIA2, R2: Genomics Analysis and Visualization Platform ( http://r2.amc.nl http://r2platform.com accessed on 19 December 2020), and SurvExpress are also used in this study.
